title: Luxury one bedroom, Lease NOW!!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Craft your perfect lifestyle at Olympus at Waterside Estates in Richmond, Texas.', 'With an inviting array of features and amenities, our one, two, and three bedroom apartments allow you to live the life you dream about.', 'Wake up and savor a cup of coffee in your stunning chef-inspired kitchen.', 'Amp up your day with an energizing workout in the fitness center – get your heart pumping on the cardio machines or do some slow-burn training in the yoga and TRX studio.', 'Need to cool off?', 'Our refreshing swimming pool features a tanning ledge and shady cabana seating.', 'The dreamy life is waiting.', 'Find it today at Olympus at Waterside Estates.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 18, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Cats & Dogs Welcome!', 'Maximum of 2 Pets per HomeNo', 'Weight Limit or Required Pet Deposit!1-Time Non-Refundable Pet Fee – $250 Per PetPet Deposit - $250 Per Pet Monthly Pet Rent – $25 Per PetBreed Restrictions.', 'The Following Dog Breeds (or Any Mix Thereof) are Not Permitted:\u200bAkitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Chow Chows, Doberman Pinschers, German Shepherds, Great Danes, Huskies, Pit Bulls (American Staffordshire Terriers & Staffordshire Bull Terriers), Rottweilers, St. Bernards, Wolf Hybrids & Bull Mastiffs.', 'Deposit:', 'None', 'Leasing options:', 'Month to month None,3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'None', 'Application fee:', 'None', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Garage', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Private pool, Balcony/patio, Deck, Porch', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Air conditioning, Ceiling fans', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue, Business center, Outdoor Lounge, Pet Park, Outdoor Gas Fire Pit, Cyber Café w/ Coffee Bar', 'Security and Access:', 'Elevator, Controlled access, Gated entry', 'Views:', 'Water', 'Additional features:', 'Granite countertop, Vaulted ceiling, Brushed Nickel Hardware, Stand-Up Shower*, Large Balconies / Patios, Wood Cabinets w/ Full Pantry, Crown Molding, Designer Lighting Package, 2-Panel Doors, Full-Size Walk-In Closets, Ceramic Tile Tub & Shower Surround, Oversized Tubs*, Custom Color Schemes, 2-Inch Wood Blinds, Linen Closets in Bathroom, Simulated Hardwood Flooring, Newly Renovated Homes Available', 'Offered by:', 'Olympus at Waterside Estates', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
